unnormalised: Konni Mumbai-chea havamanavishi vicharlem, hã? Mhaka sangta, Mumbai-chem havaman bhavisya sangop mhannje tumche local train kedna pavta tem sangtale bhaxen – ekdum juvach! Te 15/08/2024-ak uzo asta mhunn sangtat, punn 15:00 voram meren dhav-dhav paus poddta. Mhoji bud’di? Sodanch ek chatri gheun voch, zaleare-i havaman app “0% pausachi xakyata” mhunta zalear-i. Tum mhaka uprant dhanyavad ditole.

Ani monsoon sezonavishi mhaka suru korunk-ui di-inaka. Sumar June 1-tarikhe thavn… kitlem dis poddta tem zannona, to ek soglem dis vatten-cho park. Tum lokank guth'ne-meren udkache vatten ravtai mhunn dekhot, auto-rickshaw udkent tavortat (thoddem), ani soglle "hem pattle varshachem poros vhaitt" mhunn ninda kortat. IMD 05/07/2024-ak ek "lal ucharanni" dakhavunk xakta, punn mandhi, monsoon-achem soglem dis ek lal ucharanni mhunn dista.

Mhunnun, sangop kortam, Mumbai-chem havaman? Axech naslolo axa kara. Fatto-fatt udak, sambhavik paus, ani nischit naslolo. Ani, 7:00 voram-chea vellar havaman report dekh, tumchea divasachi suruvat korche adim tumkã hansonk zai zalear. Tem 7:05 voram meren chukichem asun xakta!
normalised: Mumboi thale havamaan koxem asa mhunn konnen tor vicharlem dista? Zalear, hanv sangtam, Mumboichem havamaan bhavixy korop mhunnlear tumchem lagichem train kitleak yetolem te sangpaak xarta – ekdom gambling bhaxen! Te tumka pandhraave august don hojar chovisacher zait mhunn sangtole, punn tin voram pasun, ekdom paus poddtai. Mhozo sallo? Sadanch ek chatri gheun voch, bhavishy sangpaachem app “shunyak taka paus poddonachoi” mhunn sangta zalearui. Tum mhaka uprant dhanyavaad ditole.

Ani mhozo monsoon season vixim start korunk nko. Sumaar June eka tarikher thaun... zalea bhaxen, to stop korunk vichartolo, tenna zasto paus podta. Tum lokam knee-deep udkant dhuvun vhanchot ailele polaitole, auto-rickshaws udartole (thodeach bhaxen), ani soglleamni Complaint kortole “hem porschea vorsa thale kharab asa!”. I-M-D panch juli don hojar chovisacher “red alert” issue kartolo, punn saty bhaxen, dar monsoonacher dar dis red alert bhaxen asta.

Tori, eka sentenceant sangpaak Mumboichem havamaan koxem asa? Akasmathik asa mhunn socha. Zait mhunn socha, podonakai mhunn socha, ani anapekshit asa mhunn khatri asa. Ho, ani havamaachem report, seven A.M. mhunn poloi, tumhaak hasopacho boro vela dista zalear tumcho dis start korchem poile. To seven zero five voram pasun kharab astolo!
